title: Please call 9-1-1 or go directly to your nearest emergency department.
subTitle: These symptoms require emergency medical care. You should call 9-1-1 immediately, or go directly to your nearest emergency department.

title: Monitor your symptoms.
subTitle: Pay attention to your health and note if anything changes for 10 days. If you start to experience worsening symptoms, please retake this self-assessment form.

title: You will be contacted by one of our doctors shortly.
subTitle: Please self-isolate and take a COVID-19 test. Monitor your symptoms. Note that sometimes symptoms may suddenly worsen and require urgent medical care.
